welcome_message_body: Welcome to Guatemala City, where the rich history and vibrant culture await you. Explore the city's charming cobblestone streets, iconic landmarks, and delicious cuisine as you immerse yourself in the beauty of this amazing destination. Enjoy your time here!

restaurants.name: Panaderia Berna
restaurants.description: Panaderia Berna is a bakery located in Ciudad de Guatemala.
restaurants.address: 10 Calle entre 5a. y 6a. Avenida Zona 1, 01001- Ciudad de Guatemala
